readingMnemonic: The <kanji>smoke</kanji> is too much and you realize this is the <reading>en</reading>d (えん) for you. You're gonna die here!
meaningMnemonic: You have a <radical>fire</radical> going on some <radical>dirt</radical> when a <radical>helicopter</radical> flies overhead. This causes <kanji>smoke</kanji> from the fire and the dirt to spread everywhere! It's in your eyes, your mouth, your ears! The smoke gets in your lungs and you can't breathe. Why helicopter, why!
